title: Does Vaping Raise Your Risk of Covid   Symptoms
description: There are no studies yet  but reports showing heightened dangers for tobacco smokers and lung damage from vaping are raising alarms for doctors and parents
content: Like many parents  LeeAnn is terrified her son will catch Covid    She lives in New York  near the nations coronavirus epicenter  but that isnt the only issue thats worrying her  LeeAnn is especially concerned because her teenager vapes  This virus attacks t    chars
